text: Peshawar Zalmi (; ) is one of the six teams which plays in the Pakistan Super League (PSL). The team represents the city of Peshawar and was founded in 2015. Zalmi in the name means Youth. It is owned by Javed Afridi (Haier Pakistan). Babar Azam is the captain of Peshawar Zalmi, while the head coach is Mohammad Akram. == Squad == The Peshawar Zalmi Squad 2019 {| class="wikitable" Batsmen Bowlers All Rounders Platinum Wahab Riaz, Hasan Ali Keiron Pollard Diamond Kamran Akmal, Misbah ul Haq Darren Sammy Gold Dawid Malan, Umer Amin Liam Dawson Silver Sohaib Maqsood, Wayne Madsen, Jamal Anwar Umaid Asif Khalid Usman Emerging Nabi Gul Sameen Gul Supplementary Samiullah Ibtisam Sheikh Chris Jordan, Waqar Salamkheil ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website Category:Peshawar Category:Pakistan Super League teams Category:2015 establishments in Pakistan
title: Peshawar Zalmi
